dataList.name: Red Eyes
dataList.desc:
- Base Skill Coin effects inflict +1 more Bleed
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Red Eyes
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Red Eyes - Alert
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Red Eyes - Devouring
- The amount of additional bleed inflicted by the first line of this buff is equal to the buff enhancement Stage (max 3)

dataList.name: Red Eyes - Alert
dataList.desc:
- Base Skill Coin effects inflict +2 more Bleed
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects

· Stage 1 (1~7) : Red Eyes

- The amount of additional bleed inflicted by the first line of this buff is equal to the buff enhancement Stage (max 3)

dataList.name: Penitence
dataList.desc:
- Heal 2 SP On Hit with Base Skill Coins that gain Penitence
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Turn Start: gain (Penitence)% of max HP as Shield
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Penitence
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Penitence - Periphery
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Penitence - Confession
- The amount of SP healed by the first line of this buff is based on the enhancement Stage (enhancement Stage x 2)

dataList.name: Penitence - Periphery
dataList.desc:
- Heal 4 SP On Hit with Base Skill Coins that gain Penitence
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Turn Start: gain (Penitence)% of max HP as Shield
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Penitence
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Penitence - Periphery
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Penitence - Confession
- The amount of SP healed by the first line of this buff is based on the enhancement Stage (enhancement Stage x 2)

dataList.name: Penitence - Confession
dataList.desc:
- Heal 6 SP On Hit with Base Skill Coins that gain Penitence
- Max Value : 20
- Unique Charge (fixed Potency)
- Turn Start: gain (Penitence)% of max HP as Shield
- Resource used by certain Skills for additional effects
- Enhances the buff Stage based on Value
· Stage 1 (1~7) : Penitence
· Stage 2 (8~15) : Penitence - Periphery
· Stage 3 (16~20) : Penitence - Confession
- The amount of SP healed by the first line of this buff is based on the enhancement Stage (enhancement Stage x 2)

dataList.name: Only Ashes Remain
dataList.desc:
- Cannot maintain Red Eyes & Penitence
- When gaining Red Eyes with Base Skill effects, heal self and 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage by (Red Eyes gained)% of this unit's max HP (2 times per turn)
- When gaining Penitence with Base Skill effects, heal self and 1 ally with the least SP by ((Penitence gained)/2) SP (2 times per turn)
- Turn End: this effect expires

dataList.name: Mariposa
dataList.desc:
- Ahogo Único 
- Valor Base: 0, Valor Máx: 15
- La potencia y el Contador de este efecto son llamados "Las que Perduran" and "Las que Partieron" respectivamente.
- Al ser golpeado, la unidad atacante se cura por (Las que Perduran/4) PC. (min 1; redondeado hacia abajo)
- Al ser golpeado, si el PC de esta unidad es menor que 0, recibe (Potencia de Ahogo/5) de daño en Melancolía por cada valor de Las que Partieron. (Daño máximo de Melancolía 30; redondeado hacia abajo; realiza la mitad del daño a los objetivos sin PC.)
- Finalizar Turno: Reinicia el efecto de Las que Partieron a 0; luego, gana Ahogo al igual que el valor de Las que Perduran y convierte Las que Perduran en Las que Partieron.
- Ningún efecto externo puede aumentar el valor de Mariposa infligido. Efectos que "Infligen Ahogo adicional" Infligen Ahogo adicional en vez de Mariposa.
- Este efecto expira cuando tanto Las que Perduran y Las que Partieron llegan a 0.

dataList.name: Las que Perduran & Las que Partieron
dataList.desc:
- Munición Única
- La suma de Potencia y Contador llega al máximo de 20.
- Consumido por ciertas Habilidades.
- Ya sea Las que Perduran(Potencia) o Las que Partieron(Contador) la que será consumida por cada disparo es determinado aleatoriamente
- Algunos ataques se cancelarán si está unidad se queda sin munición.

dataList.name: Training Team Captain
dataList.desc:
Skill Slot +1
Modify Skill pool: Gain 1 use of Skill 3, but lose 1 use of Skill 1
Turn Start: heal 15 SP
Increase the amount of Burn, Bleed, Rupture, Sinking, or Tremor inflicted by +1 (including 'Unique Status Effects')
Increase the amount of Poise or Charge(including 'Unique Charge') gained by +1
On Kill, Gain +2 E.G.O resource to the Affinity of the Skill that defeated the enemy; gain +1 E.G.O resource to rest of the Affinities

dataList.name: Understanding
dataList.desc:
- Deal +5% more damage per Stack
- Take +5% more damage per Stack
(max value : 5)

dataList.name: Mental Fracture
dataList.desc:
SP Loss Efficiency +1 per Stack (max 5)
Expires when it reaches 5 Stack, and take 10 SP damage
Lose 1 Stack per turn

dataList.name: Imminent Decay
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Lose 1 Stack
Turn Start: At 1- Stack, use a special Skill

dataList.name: Recarga
dataList.desc:
- Efecto aplicado a Las que Perduran & Las que Partieron(Munición Única)
- Consume (30 - (Las que Perduran + Las que Partieron))/2 PC. (redondeado hacia abajo)
- Reinicia ambos valores de Las que Perduran y Las que Partieron en sí a 0, y gana el valor máximo de la suma basado en las probabilidades listadas en la Pasiva 'DelAtaúdLaMariposaTomaVuelo.'
- Al Recargar, gana al menos 1 de Las que Perduran y Las que Partieron.
